meanings.definition: Unable to be expressed in words.
meanings.sent1: The beauty of the sunset was truly inexpressibleness.
meanings.sent2: Her joy at the surprise party was inexpressibleness.
meanings.sent3: The cat's inexpressibleness reaction to the cucumber was hilarious.
meanings.sent4: The inexpressibleness love between the couple was evident to all.
meanings.sent5: The inexpressibleness pain of losing a loved one is hard to bear.

meanings.definition: Beyond the ability to be described.
meanings.sent1: The mysterious creature had an aura of inexpressibleness.
meanings.sent2: The beauty of the starry night sky was inexpressibleness.
meanings.sent3: The inexpressibleness magic trick left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: The inexpressibleness power of nature is truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The inexpressibleness feeling of nostalgia washed over her.
